metadata.description: Set in a brilliant new sci-fi universe, Sharkey is a blue-collar bounty hunter who tracks criminals across the galaxy in his converted, rocket-powered ice-cream truck. Aided and abetted by his ten-year-old partner, he's out for the biggest bounty of his career. HOLLYWOOD NEWS! Netflix's latest live-action project from Mark Millar. Read the comic before you see the movie!
metadata.name: Sharkey The Bounty Hunter
